questionTemplates.name: oh_oh_medHx_stillSeeingProvider
questionTemplates.title: Are you still seeing a doctor or health care provider for this condition?

questionTemplates.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageAboutAtDiagnosis
questionTemplates.title: About how old were you when you were first told you had this condition?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_descriptionText
elements.html:
Personal Medical History

This survey asks questions about your Personal Medical History. This is to better understand how it may affect health. It will take about 10-15 minutes to answer these questions. Please answer each question as honestly as possible. Some of the questions may be sensitive. You can choose not to answer. There are no right or wrong answers to any of the questions. It is important that you answer as many questions as you can. We are looking for your own answers, not what you think your doctors, family, or friends want you to say.

Do not feel like you have to spend a long time on each question. The first answer that comes to you is usually the best one. If you are not sure how to answer a question, choose the best answer from the options given. The first few questions ask about your perception of your heart health.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_worriedHeartHealth
elements.title: I am worried about my heart health.

choices.text: In excellent health for my age
In good health for my age
In average health for my age
In below than average health for my age
In poor health for my age

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_beliefRiskAncestry
elements.title: I believe that I am at higher risk of having a heart attack because I am of South Asian ancestry.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_heartDescription
elements.html:
Heart and blood conditions:

The next few questions are about heart health issues. Heart health is very important when considering your overall health. Answering these questions will help us get a more complete picture of your total health.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_diagnosedHeartConditions
elements.title: Has a doctor or health care provider ever told you that you have…? (select all that apply)

choices.text: Pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis
I have no heart or blood condition

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_heartFailureProcedures
elements.title: Have you ever undergone any of the following:

choices.text: Left ventricular assist device placement (I still have this)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_coronaryDiseaseProcedure
elements.title: Have you had any of the following treatments?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_heartValveProcedure
elements.title: Have you ever had any of the following:

choices.text: Open heart surgery for heart valve
Valve replacement by a catheter (TAVR, TAVI)
Mitral valve repair by a catheter (Mitraclip)

elements.title: Pulmonary embolism or deep vein thrombosis

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_otherHeartCondition
elements.title: What is the other heart or blood condition?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_womenHealthDescription
elements.html:
Women’s Health

The next few questions are about women’s health issues. Women’s health is very important when considering your overall health. Answering these questions will help us get a more complete picture of your total health.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageFirstMenses
elements.title: How old were you when you had your first menstrual period (menses)?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_regularPeriods
elements.title: During most of your life, were your periods regular; that is, did they occur about once a month? (Do not include any time when you were pregnant or taking birth control pills.)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_everBeenPregnant
elements.title: Have you ever been pregnant? It is very important that we know about all of your pregnancies, including live births, stillbirths, miscarriages, tubals (ectopics), and abortions.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_numberOfPregnancies
elements.title: How many times have you been pregnant?

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageAtEndOfFirstPregnancy
elements.title: How old were you at the end of the first of these pregnancies? (Mike, AHA)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageAtEndOfLastPregnancy
elements.title: How old were you at the end of the last of these pregnancies? (Mike, AHA)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_numberLiveBirths
elements.title: How many live births did you have? (Live birth is the birth of a living baby)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_menopausalSymptoms
elements.title: Have you ever had menopausal symptoms, such as hot flashes or night sweats? (Your best guess.)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_mensesStopped
elements.title: Have your menstrual periods stopped permanently?

choices.text: Yes, I have no menstrual periods
Yes, but I have periods induced by hormones

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_ageLastMenses
elements.title: How old were you when you last had regular menstrual bleeding (a period)? (Your best guess)

choices.text: Surgery (a hysterectomy to remove your uterus and/or oophorectomy to remove your ovaries)
Endometrial ablation (removal of the lining of the uterus)

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_lungHealthDescription
elements.html: The next few questions are about lung health issues. Lung health is very important when considering your overall health. Answering these questions will help us get a more complete picture of your total health.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_diagnosedLungConditions
elements.title: Has a doctor or health care provider ever told you that you have or had any of the following lung conditions? (select all that apply)

elements.title: Has a doctor or health care provider ever told you that you have or had any of the following cancers? (select all that apply)

Kidney conditions

The next few questions are about kidney conditions. Kidney conditions are very important when considering your overall health. Answering these questions will help us get a more complete picture of your total health.

elements.title: Has a doctor or health care provider ever told you that you have…? (select all that apply)

choices.text: Acute kidney disease with no current dialysis

elements.title: Acute kidney disease with no current dialysis

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_boneMuscleDiagnosedConditions
elements.html:
Bone, joint and muscle conditions

The next few questions are about bone, joint and muscle conditions. Bone, joint and muscle conditions are very important when considering your overall health. Answering these questions will help us get a more complete picture of your total health.

elements.name: oh_oh_medHx_boneJointDiagnosedConditions
elements.title: Has a doctor or health care provider ever told you that you have…? (select all that apply)

choices.text: Fractured/broken any bones in the last 5 years
Other bone, joint, or muscle condition
I have no bone, joint, or muscle condition

elements.title: Fractured/broken any bones in the last 5 years
Other bone, joint, or muscle condition
